description.title: ¿Qué es RecreaPlus?
description.subtitle: Resumen del Proyecto
description.paragraph1: RecreaPlus es una plataforma diseñada para recopilar y analizar las actividades recreativas preferidas por la comunidad.
description.paragraph2: Participando en nuestra encuesta podrás obtener recomendaciones personalizadas y contribuir al desarrollo de eventos recreativos en tu área.

cards.title: Accede a Recomendaciones
cards.content: Recibe sugerencias personalizadas basadas en tus preferencias recreativas y descubre nuevas actividades que disfrutarás.

cards.title: Eventos Locales
cards.content: Conoce eventos recreativos cercanos a tu ubicación y participa en ellos, mejorando tu calidad de vida.

cards.title: Contribuye a la Comunidad
cards.content: Ayuda a mejorar las actividades recreativas a nivel local y global, formando parte activa de nuestra plataforma.

hero.title: Welcome to RecreaPlus
hero.subtitle: Your platform to discover, participate, and enjoy the best recreational activities

description.title: What is RecreaPlus?
description.subtitle: Project Summary
description.paragraph1: RecreaPlus is a platform designed to collect and analyze the community's preferred recreational activities.
description.paragraph2: By participating in our survey, you can receive personalized recommendations and contribute to the development of recreational events in your area.

cards.title: Access Recommendations
cards.content: Receive personalized suggestions based on your recreational preferences and discover new activities to enjoy.

cards.title: Local Events
cards.content: Learn about recreational events near you and participate to improve your quality of life.

cards.title: Contribute to the Community
cards.content: Help improve recreational activities locally and globally by being an active part of our platform.
